entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023
